name: EASYRIDER TOUR - PARADISE CAVE - DARK CAVE
description: A one-day tour to Paradise Cave and Dark Cave is a journey for you to enjoy the natural stunning scenery on the way to Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park. Above of all, you will have the chance to stop at sights you would never see from the bus and on the back of a motorcycle with a professional guide, the scenery along the coastal road of highway 15 is truly spectacular. On our way, we will pass villages and rice paddies and stop for visiting rice farm, corn farm...
